name: Wedding Planning
short_description: Exquisite wedding planning to make your day unforgettable.
long_description: Our wedding planning service is designed to turn your dreams into reality. We handle every detail, from venue selection to decor and entertainment, to create a magical wedding experience.

name: Birthday Parties
short_description: Fun and memorable birthday parties tailored to your preferences.
long_description: We specialize in planning birthday parties that cater to all ages. Whether it's a kid's birthday or a milestone celebration, we create a joyful atmosphere with custom themes, games, and entertainment.

name: Baby Showers
short_description: Joyful baby showers to celebrate the upcoming arrival of a new family member.
long_description: Our baby shower planning service is designed to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere for expecting parents. We handle decorations, games, and everything needed to make this moment special.

name: Anniversary Celebrations
short_description: Romantic anniversary celebrations to cherish your love story.
long_description: Celebrate your love and milestones with our anniversary planning service. We create intimate and romantic settings, handle reservations, and make every moment special.

name: Festival Events
short_description: Vibrant and culturally rich festival event planning.
long_description: Experience the vibrancy of festivals with our event planning service. We organize festivals, fairs, and cultural events with traditional decor, performances, and culinary delights.
features: Games and activities for all ages

name: Graduation Parties
short_description: Memorable graduation parties to celebrate academic achievements.
long_description: Our graduation party planning service helps honor the hard work and dedication of graduates. We arrange venues, decorations, and entertainment for a memorable celebration.

name: Retirement Parties
short_description: Heartfelt retirement parties to bid farewell to valued colleagues.
long_description: Our retirement party planning service ensures that retiring employees are celebrated with dignity and appreciation. We arrange venues, speeches, and memorable experiences.

name: Housewarming Parties
short_description: Warm and welcoming housewarming parties to celebrate a new home.
long_description: Our housewarming party planning service is designed to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere for those moving into a new home. We handle decorations, refreshments, and all the details to make the occasion memorable.

name: Family Reunions
short_description: Bringing families together to create lasting memories.
long_description: Our Family Reunion planning service is all about bringing generations together to create lasting memories. Whether it's a small gathering or a grand reunion, we handle everything from logistics to activities, so you can focus on reconnecting with loved ones.
features: Catering for all tastes and dietary preferences
